name: Orbital Defender (Bocodillo)
description:
A super simple game I made mostly within the first 24 hours of LDJAM #34 as I was quite busy with other work. The goal is to survive for as long as possible by shooting the ever growing circles and collecting power-ups to turn the tide. All graphics, sound effects, music and programming done by myself.

CONTROLS:

-A/LEFT -> Rotate counter-clockwise

-D/RIGHT -> Rotate clockwise

-ESC -> Open pause menu
